serviceTypes.name: OrdersService
serviceTypes.description:
Triggers when a new event related to Shopify orders is received.
Available actions: onOrdersCreate, onOrdersCancelled, onOrdersFulfilled, onOrdersPaid, onOrdersPartiallyFulfilled, and onOrdersUpdated

package.name: trigger.shopify
package.summary: Listen to [Shopify Webhook API](https://shopify.dev/apps/webhooks) from Ballerina
package.readme:
Listen to [Shopify Webhook API](https://shopify.dev/apps/webhooks) from Ballerina

## Package overview
The `ballerinax/trigger.shopify` is a [Ballerina](https://ballerina.io/) trigger for Shopify.
This package provides the capability to listen to events in Shopify.

### Compatibility
|                               | Version                        |
|-------------------------------|--------------------------------|
| Ballerina Language            | Ballerina Swan Lake 2201.0.4   |
| Shopify Webhook API           | 2021-10                        |

## Report issues
To report bugs, request new features, start new discussions, view project boards, etc., go to the [Ballerina Extended Library repository](https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-extended-library)

## Useful links
- Discuss code changes of the Ballerina project in [ballerina-dev@googlegroups.com](mailto:ballerina-dev@googlegroups.com).
- Chat live with us via our [Slack channel](https://ballerina.io/community/slack/).
- Post all technical questions on Stack Overflow with the [#ballerina](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/ballerina) tag

modules.name: trigger.shopify
modules.summary: The Shopify trigger allows you to listen to [Shopify webhook notifications](https://shopify.dev/apps/webhooks).
